game.name: Ember Island
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 12 Levels. One Life. No Saves. Ember Island is a punishing, retro-style arcade platformer where you must beat the entire game in a single run. Choose your mercenary: Knight, Mage, or Rogue, and fight through 12 deadly zones to claim the ultimate bounty.
